title: GP and his revive damage????
body: Just had an aram game, when every time i died, it would say that gangplank did 30-50 damage with revive (didn't even have revive as one of his summoners.) is this some kind of bug?

replies.body: Its not just a Gangplank bug. Death recaps have been messed up for a long time with all sorts of occasional weird things. Revive damage can come up on anyone.

Exhaust did 500 damage to me.

Watch people say *Death recaps aren't broken*

> [{quoted}](name=JustTrash,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EYEvAasG,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-18T22:25:26.800+0000)
>
> Exhaust did 500 damage to me.
> 
> Watch people say *Death recaps aren't broken*

I've never seen anyone say death recaps aren't broken. And I occasionally visit the circlejerk kingdom of reddit.

> [{quoted}](name=JustTrash,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EYEvAasG,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-18T22:25:26.800+0000)
>
> *Death recaps aren't broken*

*Hit the nail on the head.*

But seriously, death recaps are f*cked.
It's actually sun fire cape and this has been around for a long time
It's not *only *sunfire cape though. I've been in games where it's happened and no one has had sunfire cape.
